description.value:
Lenses are made of crystals specially infused with spells as they're cut, then installed into autofocusing sights. You gain a +2 item bonus to visual Perception checks to @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.actions.Item.Seek] when looking through the scope.

Activateâ€”See the Truth 2 (manipulate)

Frequency once per day

Effect For the next 10 minutes, while looking through the scope, you can see @UUID[Compendium.sf2e.conditions.Item.Invisible] creatures as though they weren't invisible. Additionally, you can see incorporeal creatures, like ghosts, hiding within 10 feet of an object's surface.

When you activate See the Truth, you see the truth of the world. The GM rolls a secret counteract check with a [[/r 1d20+20 #Counteract]]{+20} counteract modifier and a counteract rank of 7 against any illusion, morph, or polymorph effect in the area, but only for the purpose of determining whether you see through it, not to end the spell or effect.
